A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don’t pay attention to all the low ratings by others. Some people just take the wrong things in life waaaayyyyy too seriously. Maybe it’s the fact that I’m not trying to relive my childhood that I’m able to enjoy these new installments so much. A very good movie. Jaw dropping moments. Funny dialogue reminiscent of A New Hope and ESB. Perfect? No. But perfectly entertaining. And I’ve been a fan since the beginning.
